    • The Drive API

List contents of a folder.

List contents of a folder.

drive_ls(path = "~/", pattern = NULL, ...)

Arguments

path

Character. A single path on Google Drive whose contents you want to list.
pattern

Character. If provided, only the files whose names match this regular expression are returned.
...

Parameters to pass along to the API query.

Value

An object of class dribble, a tibble with one row per file.

Examples

not_run({
  ## get contents of the folder 'abc' (non-recursive)
  drive_ls("abc")

  ## get contents of folder 'abc' that contain the
  ## letters 'def'
  drive_ls(path = "abc", pattern = "def")
})
